bibl.title: Terracotta Lamps from the Post-Phraraonic Period.
Proceedings of the Seventh International Congress of Egyptologists. Cambridge, 3-9 September 1995
bibl.author: SPAGNOTTO, Donatella

bibl.note: Preliminary report on a large number of terracotta lamps discovered by Ernesto SCHIAPARELLI at the beginning of this century. For 122 lamps the provenance is known: Ashmunein (53 samples), Heliopolis (16), Gau el Kebir (13), the Valley of the Queens (5), Hammamija (4) and Gebelein (31?).
bibl.seg: SPAGNOTTO Donatella, Terracotta Lamps from the Post-Phraraonic Period.
C.J. EYRE (Ed.), Proceedings of the Seventh International Congress of Egyptologists. Cambridge, 3-9 September 1995 = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 82 (Leuven, 1998) pp. 1085-1093, 17 figg.
